frameComponent5_title: HOW DO WE STRENGTHEN REGIONAL ECONOMIC POWER?
frameComponent5_intro: Modern mining technologies and advanced methods in extraction, digitization, energy efficiency, and work safety are essential components of the project. The training and further education of professionals in mining is also particularly emphasized.
frameComponent5_answers_investment_listI: Regional geological research and soil analysis by GIGA FIBER's private investment,
Supply of expertise and equipment for soil analysis,
Construction of own mines for copper and lithium extraction,
Production of copper products and supply of lithium batteries to the automotive industry,
Use of extracted lithium for radio mast infrastructure on the autonomous driving test track in the Karakalpakstan region,
frameComponent5_answers_economicImpact_l: New jobs increase the demand for housing, enhancing attractiveness for investors in residential construction.
The construction of new mines fosters economic growth and settlement of labor in remote regions.
The mine enables the extraction of various ores, meeting internal demand for cable production and supplying the national automotive industry.
Both extraction and supply to national companies impact the region’s and the country’s production and export rates.
frameComponent5_answers_internationalSta: Introduction of European mining practices and standards to increase competitiveness.
Building an effective value chain in the copper and lithium industry focused on export.
frameComponent5_answers_jobCreation_list: Mining requires numerous workers and collaboration with national, international, and local subcontractors.
Existing infrastructure is incorporated, fostering economic growth in the region.
Companies from the automotive industry / e-mobility establish locations for workforce and knowledge exchange.
frameComponent5_imageDescriptions_1_text: Training young workers and creating new jobs according to European standards
frameComponent5_imageDescriptions_2_text: Active political strengthening of Germany as a business location, supplying companies in Uzbekistan
frameComponent5_imageDescriptions_3_text: Export of copper products to Europe and supplying the international automotive industry with lithium
frameComponent5_imageDescriptions_4_text: Supplying lithium for cell tower power supply and for the autonomous test track
frameComponent5_imageDescriptions_5_text: Promotion of industrial development in Uzbekistan by attracting European companies
frameComponent5_imageDescriptions_6_text: Growth of the automotive industry and infrastructure
frameComponent5_imageDescriptions_8_text: of the generated profit will be invested in the autonomous driving test track.
frameComponent5_faq_question_gigaFiberPa: OBJECTIVES OF THE COOPERATION WITH GIGA FIBER
frameComponent5_faq_answer_gigaFiberPart: Uzbekistan has an impressive diversity of mineral metal and non-metal raw materials, offering enormous potential for companies. The partnership concluded with the EU in 2024 opens up diverse opportunities for cooperation in mining. This strategic alliance creates a solid foundation for sustainable investments and technological innovations in Uzbekistan's raw materials sector.
frameComponent6_title: HOW DO WE SUPPORT THE AUTOMOTIVE INDUSTRY?
frameComponent6_intro_part1: Autonomous driving aims at developing vehicles that can drive without human intervention. GIGA FIBER provides the technology for autonomous driving test tracks. We offer the international automotive market access to technology and infrastructure to further develop and test autonomous vehicles.
frameComponent6_intro_part2: Research in this field provides sustainable competitive advantages and the expansion of own automotive production. A 100 km test track is created for the research of autonomous vehicle systems.
frameComponent6_intro_part3: The technology promises extremely low latency and high data transfer rates, making it possible to transmit driving data almost in real-time. This is especially important for communication between vehicles and infrastructure.
frameComponent6_intro_part4: Latency can also be further reduced by processing data near the vehicle, at the so-called 'edge' of the network, as data does not need to be sent to distant data centers first.
frameComponent6_highlight: 5G/6G TOWERS FROM GIGA FIBER HAVE EXTREMELY LOW LATENCY AND HIGH BANDWIDTH GREATER THAN 1BIT/S. RELIABLE NETWORK COVERAGE AND HIGH NETWORK DENSITY ENSURE A STABLE CONNECTION.
frameComponent6_infrastructure_paragraph: An e-mobility vehicle consists mainly of the battery (40% of the value) and connectivity for communication during driving and charging. GIGA FIBER Technologies plans to acquire a lithium mine and build a factory for battery and radio tower production. This factory will produce batteries needed to power radio towers.
frameComponent6_infrastructure_bullet1: Particularly interesting for European e-car manufacturers due to low manufacturing costs for a battery plant.
frameComponent6_infrastructure_bullet2: Creation of approximately 1,000 new jobs in the factories.
frameComponent6_faq_question: Technology & Infrastructure Goals of Collaboration with GIGA FIBER
frameComponent6_faq_ans_part1: Collaboration with GIGA FIBER grants access to advanced technology and infrastructure.
frameComponent6_faq_ans_part2: Local automotive productions are given the opportunity to modernize their production and catch up with the technical standards of international automotive manufacturers.
frameComponent6_img1_description: Use of 5G and 6G radio towers, crucial for real-time communication between autonomous vehicles and infrastructure (V2X).
frameComponent6_img2_description: The highly secure data transmissions enable the test track to be used by numerous car manufacturers; the potential of local car manufacturers can be fully exploited.
frameComponent6_img3_description: The 5G and 6G internet infrastructure is suitable for creating numerous simulation environments that can be replicated outside of real test drives.
frameComponent6_img4_description: The test area promotes research projects in the automotive industry, independent of production activities. The test area is the Karakalpakstan region.
frameComponent6_img5_description: Expansion of a resilient and redundant fiber-optic infrastructure in the region, transmitting research results through highly secure connections.
frameComponent6_img6_description: High interest from established Chinese manufacturers.
frameComponent7_title: HOW DO WE PROMOTE GROWTH AND DIGITAL INTEGRATION?
frameComponent7_intro: The previous projects – copper and lithium mining and the construction of an autonomous test track – are setting significant economic impulses in Uzbekistan. They not only create jobs but also contribute to social development and lay the foundation for sustainable economic development. These advances lay the groundwork for our new venture: GIGA FIBER Connectivity. Using the copper and lithium resources mined from the mines, as well as the existing 5G/6G infrastructure, this project aims to further promote the country's digital transformation.
frameComponent7_intro2_part1: GIGA FIBER Connectivity is a comprehensive project aimed at building and expanding digital infrastructures. It creates interfaces for retail, enabling context-sensitive advertising, digital payments, and optimized communication to increase consumption and economic activity in Uzbekistan.
frameComponent7_intro2_part2: The business idea of GIGA FIBER Connectivity has already proven successful in various projects in the EU. Examples include:
frameComponent7_sectionData_1_points_1: Increase in revenue through targeted addressing of specific audiences.
frameComponent7_sectionData_1_points_2: WIFI and context-intensive customer engagement, location-based.
frameComponent7_sectionData_1_points_3: Increase in booking rates due to positive customer experience.
frameComponent7_sectionData_2_points_1: Contactless payment, secure, faster, better acceptance.
frameComponent7_sectionData_2_points_2: Targeted advertisements for products via smartphones at the POS.
frameComponent7_sectionData_2_ending_par: These successes demonstrate the potential of GIGA FIBER Connectivity to achieve economic benefits and increase customer satisfaction across various industries. The technology is versatile and significantly contributes to enhancing efficiency and boosting revenue.
frameComponent7_dropdown_intro_part1: This project significantly contributes to the digital transformation of Uzbekistan, ensuring that the wealth generated from raw material projects is sustainably invested in building a modern and connected economy.
frameComponent7_dropdown_intro_part2: The purchasing power gained from previous projects is supported nationwide. GIGA FIBER Connectivity creates a platform for targeted marketing strategies and strengthens financial inclusion through digital payments.
frameComponent7_sectionDataDropdown_1_po: Supporting local businesses by providing access to national and international markets.
Promoting economic diversification and increasing exports through new partnerships.
Creating new economic sectors in the technology field, leading to increased innovation.
frameComponent7_sectionDataDropdown_2_po: GIGA FIBER Connectivity enhances the user experience through device independence and privacy protection.
The goal is direct data collection and analysis of consumer and visitor behavior using local-based technology and indoor GPS.
frameComponent7_sectionData_5_points_1: Innovative banking services tailored to individual needs.
frameComponent7_sectionData_5_points_2: Optimized communication between banks and customers.
